Bio

Full Stack Software Developer, Crypto Enthusiast, Blogger

I am a full stack software developer with over 7+ years of experience. I have worked on many exciting international, local and personal projects. I am also an enthusiast in the Crypto space because I believe crypto is the future of world finance. I have worked on great crypto projects too. I blog for fun and freelance on topics I find interesting to share with the world.
